description:
The Dark Tournament attracts the most dangerous demons and humans that the world has ever seen. But before the competition begins, Yusuke’s crew must survive the boat ride to Hanging-Neck Island.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le tournoi des arts martiaux de l`ombre
Shi no Funade! Jigoku no Shima e
死の船出! 地獄の島へ
